devops.title: DevOps
devops.description: Learn how to deploy, monitor, and maintain JAQ Stack applications using modern DevOps practices.

intro.title: What Is JAQ Stack?
intro.description: JAQ Stack (pronounced "jack stack") is a Rapid Application Development (RAD) archetype that combines three proven technologies into a single, cohesive blueprint:

using-angular.title: Using Angular
using-angular.description: Learn how to use Angular in the JAQ Stack ecosystem for building modern web applications.

using-java.title: Using Java
using-java.description: Learn how to use Java with Helidon in the JAQ Stack ecosystem.

using-nosql.title: Using NoSQL
using-nosql.description: Learn how to use NoSQL databases in the JAQ Stack ecosystem for flexible and scalable data storage.
